narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Safe Residential Care LLC is a Residential Treatment Facility  Physical Disabilities provider based in Westbrook, ME. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $94.6M in Medicaid payments across 8K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $94.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
